entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Norway House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Norway House Airport 01:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

Temperature: -33.0°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the morning. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
